description: Pick your Celtic XI for season opener
title: Pick your Celtic XI for season opener
title_page: Pick your Celtic XI for season opener - BBC Sport
maintext:
Celtic will be looking to start their campaign with a win when they host Ross County on Saturday, aiming to retain their Scottish Premiership crown.
Brendan Rodgers is back in charge at Parkhead, but what would your Celtic team be if you were in charge?
